column4: is there a program that will backup my ubuntu install as it is todau ... from the current look of my x and all the shortcuts on the panels to the folders and names etc and placement or at least restore the desktop items ?
is there a url or website for sbackup ? for me to look at ? nickrud ?
all of that is stored under your home directory, just back that up and you're good
essentially, yes.  Some system-wide configuration lives in /etc/ but most everything you want is in your home direcotyr
